College_Summary: Mandsaur University, Mandsaur offers undergraduate, postgraduate and research programs in the discipline of Engineering, Tourism and Hospitality, Pharma, Microbiology, etc.

Government Of Dentistry College Indore, shortly referred to as GDC Indore, was established in 1961 in Madhya Pradesh. The college offers a BDS course in the UG domain and MDS with 10 specializations at the PG level. Admissions are based on NEET and NEET-MDS scores. To be eligible for the MDS courses, applicants have secured a minimum of 50% marks in 10+2 level for the BDS course and the applicants must have a BDS degree from a recognized dental college. The college has excellent facilities including a library, many laboratories, a hostel, a hospital, etc.

College_Summary: Government Holkar Science College, recognized the college as a Model College by the MP Government, is an autonomous college at UG and PG level. The college offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and M.Phil programs in the streams of Science and Computer Applications. Admission to UG and PG courses is merit-based, whereas admission to M.Phil and Ph.D. programs is based on Doctoral Entrance Test (DET). Applicants looking for admission to the college can apply online as well as offline.

College_Name: Sanjay Gandhi Govt. Autonomous P.G. College, Sidhi

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Summary: GRY Institute of Pharmacy was established in the year 2001 and is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV), Bhopal. The Institute is approved by AICTE and PCI. It is also recognized by the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE). The Institute offers UG and PG programmes and admission in the programme is based on counselling. Candidates can apply to this College online. The placement rate from this Institute is around 70%.

Shri Jayantilal Hirachand Sanghvi Gujarati Innovative College Of Commerce & Science, Indore

College_Summary: Extol College is a private college which is affiliated to BU, Bhopal and accredited by NAAC. Extol offers BA, BBA, B.Sc, B.Com and B.Com (Hons) courses at the undergraduate level and offers an M.Sc course at the postgraduate level. Admission to the courses offered is based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit Extol’s students include Wipro, HDFC Bank, SBI Life Insurance, ICICI Prudential among various others.

College_Name: Lakshmi Narain Academy Of Pharmacy - [LNAP], Gwalior
College_Summary: The Academy was established in the year 2009 by Late Shri C.L Chouksey. Lakshmi Narain Group is well-known for its Academics since 1993. The Academy offers undergraduate courses of Pharmacy like B.Pharm to the students. It also offers D.Pharm and M.Pharm courses. The admission is done based on entrance and merit both. The Admission process can be done by filling the form online.

College_Name: SISTEC-E, Bhopal- Sagar Institute of Science Technology and Engineering
College_Summary: Sagar Institute of Science Technology and Engineering (SISTEC-E), Bhopal, one of the best engineering colleges in MP. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Engineering. Accepted entrance score for M.Tech is GATE. B.Tech admission is merit-based. The total fee for the B.Tech course is about INR 2.52 LPA. However, the total course fee for the 2 year M.Tech program is INR 50,000.

Sri Satya Sai University of Technology & Medical Sciences (SSSUTMS), Bhopal is a private university established in the year 2013. SSSUTMS aims to provide higher education to all the students and make them efficient in every aspect. The university offers multidisciplinary courses in various fields of Engineering, Medical, Languages, Pharmacy, Science, etc.

College_Name: Vasundhra Raje Homeopathic Medical College and Hospital - [VRHMC], Gwalior

College_Summary: Indore Indira Business School, Indore is a private institute. Established in 2009, Indore Indira Business School (IIBS) is located at Indore in Madhya Pradesh. The institute has received accreditation from AICTE (All India Council for Technical Education). Indore Indira Business School is spread over 5 acres.

College_Name: Sagar Institute of Research & Technology -  Pharmacy [SIRTP], Bhopal
Sagar Institute of Research Technology & Science -[SIRTS], Bhopal

College_Summary: Gandhi Medical College is a leading medical college in Bhopal established in 1955. The college offers M.B.B.S, M.Ch in Paediatric Surgery, M.Ch in Plastic Surgery, M.Sc. in Medical Biochemistry, MS, MD, Diploma in various courses, and paramedical courses in almost 10 departments. To be eligible for Admission at Gandhi Medical College, one must have a cut-off score in NEET (for MBBS). Students can apply online as well as offline mode.

Shyam Shah Medical College located at Rewa was established in the year 1963. It is affiliated to AP Singh University and is approved by MCI. The programs offered include MBBS, MD, MS, and Diploma. Admissions to courses are based on NEET UG and PG examinations, and the respective counseling. It also has a well-equipped School of Nursing and the Sanjay Gandhi Hospital and Gandhi Memorial Hospital affiliated to it.

State Institute of Hotel Management ( SIHM ), Indore, Madhya Pradesh is a reputed institute that evidences their excellence every year by getting their students placed in renowned institutes of the hospitality industry. SIHM offers only a UG course and some of the gripping diplomas such as food production, housekeeping, etc. Admission to the UG  course is through NCHMCT whereas diplomas are merit-based. Applications looking forward to getting admission to the institute may apply online.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] (Hospitality and Hotel Administration)

College_Name: Shri Arihant College of Professional Education - [ACPE], Ratlam
College_Summary: Shri Arihant College of Professional Education is a recently-established (2011) institute in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh. It is known for its various BCom specializations and its BSc in computer science. Being situated near an industrial area its campus is currently 0.55 acres. However, facilities for indoor and outdoor sport are available which students are encouraged to participate in.

Christian Eminent College was established in 1994 and is affiliated with Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya. It imparts various courses in the field of management, technology, and science. The college offers UG course, Pg course, Diplomas with multiple specializations under every course. Admission to these courses is merit-based. Candidates who wish to take admission to the institute may apply online. The institute is well furnished with all the facilities with the motive of providing premier experience and learning to their students.

College_Name: Shri Vaishnav College of Commerce - [SVCC], Indore

College_Summary: Government Mahakoshal Arts & Commerce, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh was established in the year 1836 and is affiliated to Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya under University Grants Commission. Though the college was later granted autonomy in the year 1992. The College has also been accredited NAAC Grade B.

R D Gardi Medical College (RDGMC) is a private medical college established in the year 2001 at Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh. It has been approved by MCI and is affiliated with Vikram University, Ujjain. The college offers MBBS at the Undergraduate level and MD and MS programs at the Postgraduate level. Admissions to the courses are purely based on national level entrance tests.

College_Name: Shyamlal Pandiviya Govt. Post Graduate Colllege , Morar, Gwalior
Shri Neelkantheshwar Government Postgraduate College, Khandwa
College_Summary: Shri Neelkantheshwar Government Postgraduate College was established in 1948. It is one of the reputed colleges in Khandwa, Madhya Pradesh. The college has been accredited ‘B’ grade by NAAC and it is affiliated to Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya University, Indore. Shri Neelkantheshwar Government Postgraduate College offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in arts, commerce, and science stream.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Science

College_Name: Virtual Voyage College of Design, Media, Art and Management, Indore

College_Summary: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research, Bhopal (IISER Bhopal) is an independent research centre that offers graduate, undergraduate, and research programmes. It is one of the top five IISERs. It was established in 2008, by the Indian government in Bhauri, Bhopal. IISER Bhopal offers BS, BS-MS (Dual Degree), M.Sc, Integrated Ph.D. and Ph.D. courses. There are 10 departments and 3 Centres of Excellence in the institute. IISER Bhopal campus is spread over an area of 200 acres. The institution has a gender ratio of 2:1 (M: F).

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [BS] + Master of Science [MS]

College_Summary: Government Maharaja College is one of the oldest institutions in Madhya Pradesh, it has offered higher education to a countless number of students in its long journey of more than 100 years. The college has an accreditation from NAAC and is affiliated to Maharaja Chhatrasal Bundelkhand University. The college is also recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC). The college offers various UG and PG programs across 3 different streams that are Arts, Commerce, and Science. Admission to the college is done on the basis of marks secured in previous qualifying examinations.
Some of the highlights of MPMSU are tabulated below:

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: Shri Vaishnav Vidyapeeth Vishwavidyalaya (SVVV), Indore is a private university established under Madhya Pradesh Niji Vishwavidyalaya (Sthapana Avam Sanchalan) Adhiniyam in 2015. The institute is recognized as the Most Innovative Private University in MP by Times Icons of Madhya Pradesh 2020 and awarded “Longest Continuous SBC” under CSI Academic Award in CSI-2020 Annual Convention. The University has been established with a vision to be a leader in shaping a better future for mankind through quality education, training and research. SVVV Indore offers degree and doctoral courses in the discipline of Engineering, Management, Science, Arts, Design and many more.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Computer Applications [BCA] (Big Data Analytics)

College_Summary: Maharaja Chhatrasal Bundelkhand Vishwavidyalaya is a state University recognized by UGC and accredited from AICTE, AIU, AISHE and MPCST. The university spreads across 40 acres and is affiliated to 183 institutions across 5 districts of Madhya Pradesh, Chattarpur, Panna, Tikamgarh, Damoh and Sagar. Maharaja Chhatrasal Bundelkhand Vishwavidyalaya provides students with more than 50 UG and PG courses along with vocational studies and distant learning.

College_Name: Raja Mansingh Tomar Music & Arts University, Gwalior
College_Summary: Raja Man Singh Tomar Arts and Music University was established in 14th August 2008 in the honor of Raja Mansingh Tomar as the king was very fond of Music and Dance. During his ruling period, there was great increase in progress of Music and Sculpture.

College_Name: Sanchi University of Buddhist-Indic Studies - [SUBIS], Bhopal
College_Summary: Sanchi University of Buddhist - Indic Studies (SUBIS) is a state university which was established in 2013 by the Government of Madhya Pradesh. Sanchi University offers M.A., M.Sc., MFA, M.Phil and Ph.D. programs in various discipline. Apart from this, certificate and diploma courses are also offered by the university. Students looking for admission in the Institution must appear for an entrance test conducted at University level.

Jiwaji University School Of Distance Education offers 5 graduate courses with 14 post graduate specialisations and 4 PG diploma and certificate courses. It is accredited to NAAC with Grade A and recognized by the Department of Higher Education, Govt. of Madhya Pradesh. It is also recognized by the National Commission for Minority Educational Institutions, Govt. of India.
Dream Valley College was established in 2009 and is located in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, and founded by the State Legislative Act of Madhya Pradesh Government, India.

SICA College Indore was founded in 2013 by SICA educational trust. The college offers ten bachelor courses in the field of commerce, physics, maths, statistics, computer applications, business administration, and journalism like B.Sc, B.Com, BA, and BBA. The admission is based on merit as per the M.P. Higher education rules. Applicants can apply for any of the ten courses by applying through the online application form on the college website or by going to college and submitting the application form in hand to the administrative office.

The main concern of the college is for the growth of the youth with 4C’s – Competence, Character, Conscience, and Commitment. The institute is already running a higher secondary school in Hindi and English medium for socially backward and poor classes. The leadership given by the eminent members of the Trust and College Management facilitates the progress of the College through all the activities of the Institution.

The institute comes under the aegis of Radiant Educational Society. RIMS offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Management, Commerce, Social Work and many more.

Liberal College is one of the best colleges in Indore, Madhya Pradesh established in 2009. It is a co-education and is approved and affiliated with Devi Ahilya Vishwavidhyalya and is recognized by the National Council for Teaching Education (NCTE). The institution is private and has a peaceful environment to study and learn new things, a modern digital library, and fully equipped computer laboratories.

College_Name: Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel College, Barwaha
College_Summary: Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel College, also known as SVBPC is located in Barwah Road, Mandleshwar, in Madhya Pradesh and was established in 2002. SVBPC offers 13 courses across 3 streams namely Science, Commerce, and Arts. Some degrees offered by the college are BBA, B.Com, M.Com, B.Sc., and M.Sc. Popularly pursued courses from Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel College are Commerce and Science. Admission to these courses is based on merit and the application mode is online.

College_Name: ITM University, School of Nursing Sciences, Gwalior
College_Summary: ITM University, School of Nursing Sciences, established in 2002. The institute is affiliated to ITM University and approved by the Government of Madhya Pradesh. The college has received accreditation from Indian Nursing Council and State Nursing Council. School of Nursing Sciences offers UG and PG courses.

College_Name: ITM University, School of Agriculture, Gwalior
College_Summary: ITM University, School of Agriculture was started in the year 2013. The institute is affiliated to the ITM University, Gwalior and approved by Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR), New Delhi. The agricultural institute offers degree courses. School of Agriculture was established with the motive to promote agriculture among the young generation of Madhya Pradesh.

College_Name: Artemisia College of Art and Design (ACAD), Indore
College_Summary: Artemisia College of Art & Design (ACAD), established in 2014, is one of the top-notch colleges in India.  The institute is affiliated with Raja Man Singh Tomar Music & Art University. ACAD ranks best amongst all the Animation and Graphic Design colleges in the state and is the only design college in the country to have its own Animation and Game Production Studio – ACAD Studios. The college offers 14 UG, certification, and diploma programs under 6 disciplines namely Animation & VFX, Game Design & Development, Interior Design, Fashion Design, Painting, and Photography. Artemisia College is affiliated with Raja Man Singh Tomar Music & Art University, a UGC recognized University. The most popular course of ACAD is the 4-year B.Design course across 4 specializations. Apart from that, the institute also offers a 4 year BFA course in painting and Diploma and Certification courses in 4 specializations. The minimum eligibility to apply for the ACAD program is 10+2. The selection of the candidates is done through either ACAD entrance exam or portfolio evaluation.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: NRI Institute of Nursing (NIN) is one of the Best Nursing Institutes in Bhopal. The Institute was established in the year 2017 and is recognized by Indian Nursing Council (INC). It is also academically affiliated to Madhya Pradesh Medical Science University (MPMSU), Bhopal. Courses offered by NIN are B.Sc. (Nursing) and Diploma in General Nursing and Midwifery.

College_Name: Maya Academy of Advanced Cinematics - [MAAC], Bhopal
NMIMS - Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies, Indore
College_Summary: Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies (NMIMS) Indore is a Deemed-to-be University established in 2017. SVKM’s Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies, is a privately owned co-ed institute. It offers 8 courses and admission is done on the basis of marks obtained in the entrance examinations. The courses offered are MBA, B.B.A, B.Com Hons., B.A L.L.B Hons, B.B.A L.L.B Hons, B Tech+ MBA and B.Pharm + MBA (5 Years Integrated Program).

College_Name: Xavier Institute of Development Action and Studies - [XIDAS], Jabalpur
College_Summary: Xavier Institute of Development Action and Studies (XIDAS) Jabalpur is a prestigious institute established in the year 1995. It is approved by AICTE. The institute offers a PGDM degree in six different disciplines viz. Business Management, HR, Marketing, Finance, and Rural Management. Admission is made on the basis of scores obtained in the All India level management aptitude test (CMAT/MAT/XAT/ATMA/CAT). The institute has a decent placement record with 115 recruiters on average. It has a modern infrastructure and a qualified faculty team for a great learning atmosphere.

College_Name: Design Solution Institute of Fashion Design - [DSIFD], Indore
College_Summary: Established in 2018, the Design Solution Institute of Fashion Designs (DSIFD) is an internationally recognised institute comprising three campuses at Raipur, Mumbai and Indore that imparts international fashion and serves as academic centres of design. The institute provides a variety of undergraduate, postgraduate and short term certification courses which include Diploma courses, summer program and weekly programs in the fields of fashion designing, interior designing and related fields. DSIFD is nationally accredited to Raja Maan Singh and APJ Abdul Kalam University. Admission is strictly merit- based, followed by interview and group discussion rounds.

The programs are designed for those who wish to enter the Healthcare Industry as licensed Pharmacists. Indore Institute of Pharmacy, Indore was established in the year 2004, starting the course of Diploma in Pharmacy. Bachelor of Pharmacy course was introduced in the year 2006 and the Master's course in Pharmaceutics and Pharmaceutical Quality Assurance was introduced in 2012. All the courses are approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi; and Pharmacy Council India, New Delhi. The college is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya, Bhopal (M.P.).

Maharishi Mahesh Yogi Vedic Vishwavidyalaya (MMYVV), located in district Katni of Madhya Pradesh is in the list of recognized universities maintained by UGC. The e-book is being provided on student login and online counseling sessions are being set up to clear the doubts.

College_Name: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Polytechnic College, Gwalior
College_Summary: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Polytechnic College, Gwalior was founded in 1905 by the Madhya Pradesh state government. The college is offering 10 part-time and full-time diploma courses across different streams. The college comes under one of the most prominent and significant colleges in Madhya Pradesh. The institution is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV), Bhopal. In college, each student is shaped as entire person by acquiring new knowledge, concepts, and attitude. The admission into the diploma courses is done merit-based, which primarily depends on the PPT exam conducted by the institution itself and doesn’t require any entrance cutoff or ranking.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Hotel Management & Catering Technology

College_Summary: Graduate School of Business (GSB), Indore is one of the most Glamorous and most Reputed Management, Commerce and Fashion Design colleges of Central India. The college is best known for its super-specialized Undergraduate and Postgraduate Courses & Programs like BBA, B.COM, BCA, BA, Fashion Design, MBA (Masters of Business Administration), with numerous streams and subject specialisations in Finance, Marketing, Human Resource (HR), Foreign Trade, Computer Sciences, Psychology, Sociology, Economics, Political Science.
Dharmashtra National Law University(DNLU), Madhya Pradesh was set up in the year 2018, under the recognition of University Grants Commission(UGC).

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}
Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB] {Hons.}

College_Name: ISBA Institute of Professional Studies - [ISBA], Indore
College_Summary: ISBA Institute of Professional Studies was established in the year 2010. It is affiliated to Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Indore. ISBA offers a total of 20 Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Vocational Degree Courses across various disciplines. It is a M.P Government recognized institution. The curriculum is designed to provide the students with maximum industrial exposure which benefits them and adds to their knowledge.

College_Name: Institute of Aeronautics and Engineering -[IAE], Bhopal
College_Summary: Institute of Aeronautics and Engineering (IAE), Bhopal is a technical institute, ranked 7th in Overall ranking of Top-10 Engineering institutes in Central India (Times Engineering Survey 2020). The institute is approved by the Director-General of Civil Aviation and is administered by the managing body of Sha-Shib Group of Institutions. Currently IAE is facilitating its learners to pursue a Dual Program (AME+B.Tech) i.e. 4 year Bachelor of Technology degree along with Aircraft Maintenance Engineering Course.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Aircraft Maintenance Engineering [AME] + Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech]
Aircraft Maintenance Engineering [AME] + Bachelor of Science [B.Sc]
Aircraft Maintenance Engineering [AME] + Bachelor of Business Administration [BBA]
Aircraft Maintenance Engineering [AME] + Bachelor of Computer Application [BCA]

College_Name: Mahatma Gandhi College of Law - [MGCL], Gwalior

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Summary: IPS College of Pharmacy was set up in the year 2005. The college is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV) and recognized by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. The institute offers degree and diploma course in Pharmacy.

College_Name: Jai Institute of Nursing & Research - [JINR], Gwalior
College_Summary: Jai Institute of Nursing and Research (JINR) was established in the year 2006. The institute is affiliated to Madhya Pradesh Medical Science University, Jabalpur and recognized by the Indian Nursing Council, State Nursing Council and Government of Madhya Pradesh. JINR comes under the umbrella of the VSIM Group of Studies. The institute offers degree and research courses in Nursing and Midwifery. Admission is done on the basis of merit.

College_Name: Jai Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences & Research - [JIPSR], Gwalior
College_Summary: Jai Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences and Research (JIPSR) is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Prayodgiki Vishwavidyalaya, Bhopal and recognized by the Pharmacy Council of India (PCI). JIPSR comes under the umbrella of VSIM Group of Studies. The institute offers degree and diploma level courses in Pharmacy. Admission is purely done on the basis of merit.

G. T. Polytechnic College at Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh was established in the year 1956 by the Government of Madhya Pradesh. The institution has got the approval from All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) New Delhi and is affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV), Bhopal. It imparts Technical Education by offering the diploma level courses after 10th board exam. This institute is located in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh to serve the remote students even, who strive to get proper education with a better scope for placements.

College_Name: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design - [INIFD], Indore
College_Summary: International Institute of Fashion Design (INIFD), World’s Largest Network of design Institutes with 2 decades of existence, over 3 lac pass outs and approximately 20,000 students passing out every year, INIFD centers worldwide, national and international collaborations, providing the nation’s common man a new perspective and career in Fashion and Interior Design. INIFD is the first educational institute in the world to completely digitize education to change the learning landscape for thousands of students across all INIFD centers!

Footwear Design & Development Institute is a leading research and training institute dedicated to the advancement and growth of the Footwear and Product, Leather Products, Retail and Fashion Merchandise and Fashion Design industries. The institute offers undergraduate fashion and footwear design course, namely, BDes and MBA. Admission to B.Des course is done through a valid score in AIST.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Business Administration [MBA] (Fashion Merchandising and Retail Management)

College_Summary: Footwear Design And Development Institute (FDDI) Guna, offers undergraduate courses in the field of Fashion Design and Footwear Design. Many reputed National and Multinational companies like Nike, Adidas, Puma, Reliance Retail, Landmark Group, and others visit the institute for on-campus interviews every year.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Design [B.Des] (Footwear Design and Production Management)

College_Summary: Oxford International College is located in the outer region of Indore, Madhya Pradesh. The institute offers a wide variety of Undergraduate, Diploma, and Postgraduate courses in various disciplines like Commerce, Science, and Arts. It offers many courses across various degrees like B.Com., B.Sc., BBA, B.Des (Fashion Design), L.L.B, B.Pharm, D.Pharma, PGDM, BA, B.Ed, Diploma, MSW. Admission to its courses are completely based on merit. The institute also has a dedicated placement cell which helps the students to get many on and off-campus job opportunities.

Radharaman Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences (RIPS), Bhopal offers UG and PG courses in Pharmaceutical sciences across multiple specializations.  The college's flagship course is B.Pharma and M.Pharma. Apart from this, RIPS also offers a Diploma in Pharmaceutical sciences. The fees range for the courses in RIPS is INR 98,000- 3 Lacs. Admission to the  UG and diploma is based on the performance of the candidates in the previous qualifying examination. Admission for M.Pharma is based on valid GPAT scores.
Table of Content

College_Name: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design - [INIFD], Bhopal
SAM Global University, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh
College_Summary: SAM Global University, established in 2019 is a premier university in Madhya Pradesh. It offers around 70 regular, honors degree, and lateral entry programs in the field of science and technology, business, arts, psychology, humanities, medicine, mass communication, etc. Besides these, students can also explore short-term courses of one year like a postgraduate diploma in School Counselling.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: Government Medical College (GMC), Ratlam is a newest medical college established in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh. The college was established in 2018. The college is usually referred to as GMC Ratlam. GMC Ratlam is affiliated with Madhya Pradesh Medical Science University(MPMSU), Jabalpur. It is approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI) and is recognized as an Adverse Drug Reaction Monitoring Centre (AMC) by Indian Pharmacopoeia Commission. The college name has been recently changed to “Dr Laxmi Narayan Pandya Medical College, Ratlam”.

The Oriental Group of Institutes is a collective of two technical institutes that function under the Oriental Group.  Since 25 years of standing, competent faculty, exquisite infrastructure, outstanding RGPV results, and state of the art facilities, has carved a niche for itself in the field of Technical Education. Its’ major courses at OIST, are accredited by the NBA, New Delhi. The Group was founded by the Chancellor of Oriental University in the year 1995. With a fully disciplined ambiance, the Oriental Group happens to be the preferred choice of students during admissions.

College_Name: Oriental Institutes of Professional Studies - [OIPS], Jabalpur
College_Summary: Oriental Institutes of Professional Studies is a part of the Oriental Group, which is a centre of opportunity not only for students but also for the academicians and researchers who want to build a successful career. Directors of the Group enjoy highest salary packages in Central India and faculty members are being paid above the norms of AICTE full scale with HRA / Accommodation facilities, LTC, local transport and assured promotion policy with a number of performance-linked incentives. Oriental Group of Institutes was started by the founder Chairman Dr. KL Thakral in the year 1995.

Government Medical College (GMC) Shahdol was established in the year 2018 and is located in Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh. It is affiliated with Madhya Pradesh Medical Science University. GMC Shahdol is approved National Medical Commission (NMC). The university offers MBBS courses to eligible candidates.

GMC Shivpuri has been widely appreciated for its glorious infrastructure that gives it a monumental look. The college offers all basic facilities such as a hostel, sports ground, hospital, cafeteria and library. The college faculty consists of approximately 70-80 Experienced Teachers and 180 Resident Doctors. From celebrating festivals to hosting academic seminars, GMC Shivpuri ensures its students an engaging and enriching environment.

Future College is India’s first pay after Placement College. It works with an aim to provide high quality, affordable, pay after Placement Graduation courses for Future Software Engineers and Software Developers. It is a private college situated in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India. The college has a highly qualified team of faculty members who are all well accomplished in their respective disciplines. Future College also aid the education process of students with its state of the art infrastructure.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] (Computer Science  and Engineering)

College_Summary: Shri Vaishnav Polytechnic College (SVP) is a Government-aided institute established in the year 1962 at Indore, Madhya Pradesh. The institute offers Diploma courses in Engineering on a Regular, Part-time, and lateral entry basis. The campus spread over an area of 17 acres with excellent facilities. The institute has a well-established T&P cell which provides excellent job opportunities to the students in top companies.

Kalaniketan Polytechnic College, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh was established in the year 1947 as The Kalaniketan Institution with a vision to provide competent human resources in order to fulfill the needs of Industry and Community. In 1993, it merged with Government Polytechnic College, Madhya Pradesh, and was recognized as a college in 2002 by the name of Kalaniketan Polytechnic College. The institute offers Diploma courses in 9 streams across 2 Disciplines. Additionally, it is also providing various certificate courses according to the needs of the Industry.

Government Polytechnic College Waidhan at Singrauli in the state of Madhya Pradesh was established on 1983. It is a state-run college offering diploma courses under 6 specializations of Engineering discipline. Candidates have to fill the application form through online mode only. Admissions to the college is based on the ranking secured in the MP PPT and admission totally depends on the decision of Madhya Pradesh Board of Technical Education and Skill Development. The college placements are below par and thus data of it is not declared in the official sources.

School of Rural Management (SRM), Ratlam is promoted by two powerful entities of the rural development sector in India, viz. Krishak Bharati Cooperative Limited (KRIBHCO) and Gramin Vikas Trust (GVT). The institute offers a postgraduate diploma in Rural Management which is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Rural Management [PGDRM]

College_Summary: NRI Group of Institutions, Bhopal was established in the year 2000. It is an AICTE approved group of institutions and affiliated with RGPV, Bhopal. NRI Group of Institutions has been ranked among the top 100 institutions of India with national accreditation by NBA and international accreditation by IAO. NRI Group of Institutions provides courses in B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, BA, B.Ed, and many more disciplines across various domains.

College_Name: NMIMS School  of Law - [NMIMS SOL], Indore

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}
Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB] {Hons.}

College_Summary: Kanyakubj Nursing College (KKNC), Indore was planned by Kanyakubj Vidhya Pracharini Sabha and Kanyakubj Shaikshanik and Parmarthik Trust, a group of devoted people, committed to give the best of education to the students. The institute offers a UG Course in Nursing.

Vijayaraje College of Education (VCE), Gwalior was established in the year 2014. The institute is affiliated to Jiwaji University, Gwalior for B.Ed. Course and affiliated to MP Board of Secondary Education Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh for D.El.Ed. Course and recognized by National Council for Teacher Education. VCE comes under the umbrella of VSIM Group of Studies. VCE is a leading Institution pertaining to educational courses. The institute has committed faculties equipped with high-quality teaching ability. Students from this Institute are serving in many educational institutes of national and international repute. The institute offers degree & diploma courses in the discipline of Education. Admission will be done on merit basis.

College_Name: Akhil Bharti College of Pharmacy, Bhopal
SAGE University Campus - powered by Sunstone, Indore
College_Summary: The SAGE University Campus, Indore was established in the year 2007 and offers higher education in the field of engineering and management. With Sunstone, SAGE (Indore) helps you learn from recruiters and access industry opportunities to practice what you learn. The University focuses on skill development through different modules that are designed by industry experts. It also offers an opportunity to experience the practical application opportunities by the students. This opportunity provided by the University not only enhances the skills of the students but contributes significantly to the employability of India's youth.

Eklavya University is a private university that was established in 2020. The University is affiliated to the Government of Madhya Pradesh and accredited by AICTE, NCTE, M.P. Government, INC and UGC. EU offers various Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Diploma courses in the discipline of Agriculture, Engineering, Nursing & Paramedical Sciences, Commerce, Management, Arts & Humanities, Education & Library Science, Naturopathy & Yogic Sciences, Journalism and Mass Communication along with Design domain.

Chhindwara University (CU) now known as the ‘Raj Shankar Shah University’ was established in 2019 and is approved by the UGC and AIU. The foundation of the University was laid with the goal of rising to the top of the list of Madhya Pradesh's and the nation's most prestigious and sought-after universities. Chhindwara University offers several cutting-edge and cohesive academic initiatives for its students. The University serves as the administrative hub for its affiliated colleges across Madhya Pradesh.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Summary: Ganpati Group of Institute, Bhopal is a private institute established in 2017, affiliated to Madhya Pradesh Medical Science University and approved by Indian Nursing Council, New Delhi, Madhya Pradesh Paramedical Council and Madhya Pradesh Nurses Registeration Council. The institute offers various undergraduate,postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Pharmacy, Paramedical, Nursing & Management.

College_Name: Mittal Private Industrial Training Institute, Bhopal

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] (Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning)

College_Name: Sagar Institute of Research Technology and Science - Pharmacy [SIRTSP], Bhopal
Sri Aurobindo Institute of Pharmacy - [SAIP], Indore
College_Summary: Sri Aurobindo Institute of Pharmacy (SAIP) is the premier Pharmacy Institute of Central India. Established in 2009 by Sri Aurobindo Institute of Medical Sciences (SAIMS), the institute is affiliated to RGPV, Bhopal, approved by AICTE and PCI. SAIP is the only institute in Madhya Pradesh that offers all the courses in Pharmaceutical domain; Diploma of Pharmacy [D. Pharm], Bachelor of Pharmacy [B. Pharm], Doctor of Pharmacy [Pharm. D], Doctor of Pharmacy Post Baccalaureate [Pharm. D] and Master of Pharmacy [M.Pharm]. SAIP is the only Pharmacy Institute in MP that has an associated 1200 Bed Teaching Hospital for clinical and practical based education.

College_Name: Sri Aurobindo Institute of Management and Science - [SAIMS], Indore
College_Summary: Sri Aurobindo Institute of Management and Science (SAIMS), Indore was established in 2009 and is affiliated to DAVV, Indore. The college offers various UG and PG courses, approved by AICTE. Admission to SAIMS Indore is done on the basis of merit. Additionally, the institute has an excellent placement record. The highest placement record was 6 LPA and reputed companies such as Epam, Tech Mahindra, TCS, Wipro and many more have visited the institution.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration [BBA] (Hospitality & Hotel Administration)

College_Summary: IPS Academy, Jhabua is one of Madhya Pradesh's premier institutions. IPS academy is one of Central India’s leading institutions in terms of providing placement to its students.The highest package offered to IPS Academy students is 45 LPA and the average salary package is 7.41 LPA. IPS Academy has two campuses one in Jhabua and one in Sanwer. Both offer a wide range of courses. IPS Academy was ranked between 76-100 colleges by NIRF.

College_Summary: IPS Sanwer, established in Indore in 1994, is a renowned name in education in Central India. The institute is affiliated to DAVV, Indore and approved by UGC. IPS Academy offers UG and PG courses in various disciplines. Admission to the UG courses offered by the institute is done based on the candidate's performance in the last qualifying examination.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB]
Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: LNCT Indore Campus is a self financed Institute which was established in 2006 under the LNCT group of colleges. The college offers Diploma, UG, PG courses across Engineering, Management and Pharmacy departments. Top courses offered by LNCT Indore Indore Campus are BTech and M.Tech. Admission to these courses is done through the entrance exam like JEE-Mains, GATE, NMAT, and GMAT followed by the counseling process.

College_Name: NRI Institute Of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Bhopal
College_Summary: NRI Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences (NIPS), established in the year 2003, is one of the Best Pharmacy Colleges in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Pharmacy. Admission to NIPS depends on the performance of the candidates in various state level entrance examinations. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and experienced.

Technocrats Group was established in 1999 by Chandravadni Mahila Shikha Samiti. Technocrats group is being run by alumni of IIT, IIM and Stanford University. At present in Technocrats Group, there are four engineering, two pharmacy institutes, one management, one science and commerce college, one nursing college, one paramedical, and one law college in the same campus which has 17,000+ students and 1100+ faculty members. The Institute is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi, and Govt of Madhya Pradesh.

College_Name: Swami Vivekanand Group of Institutions, Bhopal
College_Summary: Established in 2003, Swami Vivekanand Group of Institutions, Bhopal is affiliated to RGPV, Bhopal and is approved by PCI and AICTE. The college offers UG two courses in the discipline of Pharmacy and one UG course in the field of education. Admission to the courses at SVGI is done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Summary: Sant Hirdaram Institute of Management is a Bhopal-based top-notch private college that was established in 2010 by Jeev Sewa Sansthan and offers AICTE approved 2 Postgraduate programs including Master of Business Administration, Integrated Master of Business Administration in numerous specializations and BBA as a UG course . The institute is recognized by the Government of MP, affiliated to Barkatullah University (BU) Bhopal and admission to the college’s courses is granted based on a candidate's merit in Graduation or 12th and score on the entrance exam. All the professors of the institute are highly qualified and extensively experienced in their respective fields and 5 professors are pursuing their Ph.D. degrees currently.

College_Summary: BSSS Institute of Advanced Studies is a private college in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. The institute is re-accredited “A” grade by NAAC and approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). It is affiliated to Barkatullah University, Bhopal.

Prestige University, established in 2022 is a private university located in Indore, Madhya Pradesh. PU aims to be an innovative hub for providing talent for the industry and societal needs. The university offers an Integrated BBA + MBA course at the undergraduate level and offers an MBA program in six disciplines at the postgraduate level. Admission to the MBA program will be done based on the candidate’s score in PUET/CAT/XAT/CMAT/NMAT/GMAT. Some associated recruiters with Prestige University are BAYER, HDFC Bank, Nestle, MTR, TIGER ANALYTICS, ZOMATO, DIAGEO, KPMG, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Deloitte, CIPLA, EICHER etc.

Sha-Shib Flying Academy,Guna is part of the Sha-Shib Group of Institutions, ranked 2nd among Asia's top Aviation Engineering providers 2020 for its excellent performance. The academy offers Aircraft Maintenance Engineering and Diploma courses in Commercial Pilot Licence. Candidates are required to have a medical certificate and must have passed FRTOL & RT Licence Exam to be eligible for admission in Commercial Pilot Licence. Admissions will be based on previous academic performance and on the basis of SFA -CET.

Apart from that, the college also offers a GNM course. Admission to the courses offered is based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination.

Sunstone People’s University Campus is powered by the Sunstone’s Edge, Bhopal. It is a private institute providing AICTE approved MBA course. Admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in various national and state entrance exams. The institute has witnessed 100% placement for its MBA program. The highest package is offered at INR 10 LPA. PU Campus also provides a 9 month paid internship to gain hands-on industry experience.

Admission to the courses offered is done based on the candidate’s performance in the online exams followed by a personal interview.

Novel Institute of Pharmacy, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh
College_Summary: Novel Institute of Pharmacy is a private college that was founded in 2022 and is located in the Indian city of Bhopal. It offers an Undergraduate, and Diploma course in the discipline of Pharmacy. The institute is affiliated with Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya, and approved by the Pharmacy Council of India - New Delhi, DTE Govt. of Madhya Pradesh. Admission to NIP programs is granted to aspirants based on merit of the preceding year’s qualifying exam.

Aryavart University is a Bhopal-based Private University that is approved by MP Govt. and the University Grants Commission. It offers an extensive range of, employment-oriented Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Diploma courses in Commerce, Arts, Design, Pharmacy, Science, Education, Business Administration, Management, Law, Social Work, and Hospital Administration. Admission to AU programs is granted to aspiring individuals depending on their marks in last year’s qualifying exam.

College_Name: Center for Design Studies, Indore, Madhya Pradesh
College_Summary: Center for Design Studies is a prestigious private institution in the Indian city of Indore. The college came into existence to address and fulfill the design needs of tomorrow. It is an integral part of Sri Aurobindo Institute of Technology and offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in specializations like Communication Design, User Experience Design, Innovation Design, Fashion and Textile Research, etc. Admission is granted to aspiring individuals based on merit in the previous year’s qualifying exam. The only factor that matters is individual zeal toward innovation and creativity.
